title: (x) Impact RT logo - Contour Generator {Lex}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629043450im_/http:/typophile.com/files/impactrt_6665.jpg)

Hey Typophiles -

What I really love about this typeface is

\*) its ’A’ - very cool, clean- the straight line, the leg that breaks away and creates the great negative space with the ’P’

\*)I love the counter in the ’P’ as well -very future-y

\*) the weight - very meaty - science-y

My request is to get help iding this here impact rt - and to get recommendations for other typefaces like it!

Thanks in advance!

Marko

 [‹ (x) Ian Schrager 40 Bond - Caslon (display version) {Geoff}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629043450/http:/typophile.com/node/19448 "Go to previous forum topic") [MedicMedia FONT? An easy one here.... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629043450/http:/typophile.com/node/19546 "Go to next forum topic")
author: deleteboy

comments.content:
It’s by Ray Larabie and it’s based on the RCA logo. I’ll try to find it.

- Lex

It seems to be [Contour Generator](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629043450/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/contour-generator/) stretched, obliqued, and with the “M” altered. And hey, it’s free!

- Lex

Dood how did you attach that image?  
mine are not coming up?

Lex - you are the ONE! Thanks much for the fast ID.

Marko
